oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Persistent IBR Infections in the Bovine Lymphoid System: Implications for Vaccination and Control
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Chase, Christopher C. L.
Wang, Pu
Hurley, David J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Respiratory tract infection
bovine herpesvirus 1
bovine rhinotracheitis
bovine respiratory disease
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Respiratory tract infection with bovine herpesvirus 1 (BHV-1) results in infectious bovine rhinotracheitis (IBR), a significant clinical syndrome of cattle that plays a major role in bovine respiratory disease.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1996; 158
